name: Jissen Pachi-Slot Pachinko Hisshouhou! Sammy's Collection Hokuto no Ken Wii
overview: Jissen Pachi-Slot/Pachinko Hisshouhou! Sammy's Collection Hokuto no Ken Wii is a 2007 pachinko and pachi-slot simulation by Sammy and Sega for the Wii released in Japan. It ties into Sammy's Hisshouhou! series of simulations and (as with several entries in the series) the Hokuto no Ken media franchise.
